name: Minecraft Obby
description:
Imagine an obstacle course... but in Minecraft! This made-out-of-stone obby features a bunch of stages. Server might be possible, I might work on that.

NOTICE: This world is only compatible with Minecraft Java Edition. It is not compatible with bedrock edition.

What's new in v2:

- Added checkpoints
- Put torches in Stage 9
- Added a new secret
- Changed the icon
- "Upgraded" the credits
- Revamped the path to the credits area
- Added a Skip Credits button to the Credits area
- Added love for you! Be sure to keep a blocky eye out for more updates!
